string.name: lyrics
string.br: Before I die I\'m tryna **** you, baby \n
Hopefully we don\'t have no babies \n
I don\'t even wanna go back home \n
Hopefully, I don\'t leave you on your own \n
Ayy \n
Trips that you plan for the next whole week \n
Bands too long for a brother so cheap \n
And your flex OD, and your *** OD \n
You got it, girl, you got it (ayy) \n
You got it, girl, you got (yeah) \n
Pretty lil\' thing, you got a bag and now you wildin\' \n
You just took it off the lot, no mileage \n
Way they hittin\' you, the DM lookin\' v****** \n
Talkin\' wild, you come around and now they silent \n
Flew the c**p at 17, no guidance \n
You be stayin\' low but you know what the vibes is \n
Ain\'t never got you nowhere bein\' modest \n
Poppin\' **** but only \'cause you know you\'re poppin\', yeah \n
You got it, girl, you got it (ayy) \n
You got it, girl, you got it \n
Lil\' baby in her bag, in her ****** \n
No nine to five, put the work in \n
Flaws and all, I love \'em all, to me, you\'re perfect \n
Baby girl, you got it, girl, you got it, girl (oh-oh) \n
You got it, girl, you got it, girl (ooh) \n
I don\'t wanna play no games, play no games \n
**** around, give you my last name (oh) \n
Know you tired of the same damn thing \n
That\'s okay \'cause, baby, you \n
You got it, girl, you got it (ayy) \n
You got it, girl, you got it \n
You the only one I\'m tryna make love to, pickin\' and choosin\' \n
They ain\'t really love you, runnin\' games, usin\' \n
All your stupid exes, they gon\' call again \n
Tell \'em that a real brother steppin\' in \n
Don\'t let them brothers try you, test your patience \n
Tell \'em that it\'s over, ain\'t no debatin\' (uh) \n
All you need is me playin\' on your playlist \n
You ain\'t gotta be frustrated \n
I don\'t wanna play no games, play no games (oh) \n
**** around, give you my last name (my last name) \n
Know you tired of the same damn thing (same damn thing) \n
That\'s okay \'cause, baby, you \n
You got it, girl, you got it (oh, ooh, ayy) \n
You got it, girl, you got it (got it) \n
I don\'t wanna \n
Before I d*e, I\'m tryna **** you, baby (yeah) \n
Hopefully, we don\'t have no babies (ooh) \n
I don\'t even wanna go back home \n
Hopefully, I don\'t leave you on your own \n
You got it, girl, you got it, oh \n
Play no games (no) \n
Freaky (freaky) \n
I can learn a lot from you, gotta come teach me (woo, woo) \n
You a lil\' hot girl, you a lil\' sweetie (no, sweet) \n
Sweet like Pearland, sweet like Peachtree (like that) \n
I can tell you crazy, but **** kind of intrigue me (no, yeah, I like that) \n
(I don\'t wanna, I don\'t wanna) \n
Seen it on the \'Gram, I\'m tryna see that **** in 3D, mami \n
I know I get around \'cause I like to move freely \n
(I don\'t, I don\'t) \n
But you could lock it down, I could tell by how you treat me \n
(I don\'t, I don\'t) \n
I seen how you did homeboy, so please take it easy (no, yeah) \n
Good to have me on your side, I ain\'t sayin\' that you need me (yeah, yeah) \n
Six God talk but I ain\'t tryna get preachy (no, no, no) \n
I seen how you did homeboy, please take it easier on me \n
\'Cause I don\'t wanna (no) play no games, play no games \n
(I don\'t wanna, I don\'t wanna) \n
I don\'t wanna play no games, play no games \n
(I don\'t, I don\'t) \n
I don\'t, I don\'t \n
No \n
